document.full_text: the mccarter theater's 2011-12 season will include world premieres by  john guare, danai gurira ("eclipsed"), and the irish playwright marina carr,  along with productions of tom stoppard's "travesties."
document.title: new john guare play for mccarter theater's 2011-12 season
lines_and_colors: the mccarter theater's 2011-12 season will include world premieres by  john guare, danai gurira ("eclipsed"), and the irish playwright marina carr,  along with productions of tom stoppard's "travesties."
